trans-unit.source: Represents a set of line segments defined by a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PointCollection"></xref> with each <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> specifying the end point of a line segment.
trans-unit.target: 代表所定義的直線線段的一組<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PointCollection"></xref>與每個<xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref>指定線段的結束點。

trans-unit.source: Use this class to create a series of connected lines in a <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個類別來建立一系列連接的直線<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>。</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PolyLineSegment"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PolyLineSegment"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PolyLineSegment"></xref> class with the specified list of points that determine the line segments and a value indicating whether the segments are stroked.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PolyLineSegment"></xref>類別指定清單的點，以決定直線線段，而值，指出是否圖案的區段。

trans-unit.source: A collection of points that determine the line segments of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PolyLineSegment"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 決定之直線線段的點集合<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PolyLineSegment"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to make the segment stroked; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>..
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要讓圖案; 區段否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>...

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PolyLineSegment"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 建立可修改複製品這個<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PolyLineSegment"> </xref>，製作這個物件值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 （但可能已不能再解析），但不是動畫或它們目前的值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: 複製的物件<> *> 屬性會是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使來源的<> *> 屬性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PolyLineSegment"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 建立可修改複製品這個<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PolyLineSegment"></xref>物件，製作這個物件目前值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不會複製資源參考、 資料繫結和動畫，但是其目前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 複製的物件<> *> 屬性會是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使來源的<> *> 屬性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> structures that defines this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PolyLineSegment"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定集合<xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref>結構中定義這個<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PolyLineSegment"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: A line is drawn from the end point of the previous segment or, if this is the first segment, from the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure.StartPoint%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure> to the first point in this collection.
trans-unit.target: 從上一個區段的結束點繪製線條或，如果這是第一個區段中，從<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure.StartPoint%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>此集合中的第一個點。</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure.StartPoint%2A>

trans-unit.source: Lines are then drawn between each subsequent point specified in this collection.
trans-unit.target: 然後在此集合中指定每個後續點之間繪製行。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The shape of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PolyLineSegment"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 這個圖形<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PolyLineSegment"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PolyLineSegment.Points*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Media.PolyLineSegment.Points*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.PolyLineSegment.Points*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。
